description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝，唐肃宗李亨长子。原名李俶，安史之乱中以兵马元帅名义收复两京。即位后，安史之乱结束，但唐朝开始走向衰落，面临藩镇割据、回鹘勒索和吐蕃侵扰等问题。笃信佛教。
description.en: Emperor of the Tang Dynasty, the eldest son of Emperor Suzong. Originally named Li Chu, he recovered the two capitals, Chang'an and Luoyang, as Marshal during the An Lushan Rebellion. After his ascension, the rebellion ended, but the Tang Dynasty began to decline, facing issues such as the fanzhen system, extortion from the Uyghur Khaganate, and invasions by the Tibetan Empire. He was a devout Buddhist.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝，唐玄宗之子，唐代宗李豫的父亲。
description.en: Emperor of the Tang Dynasty, son of Emperor Xuanzong and father of Emperor Daizong (Li Yu).

description.zh-cn: 唐肃宗的妾室，唐代宗的生母。
description.en: A concubine of Emperor Suzong and the birth mother of Emperor Daizong.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝，唐代宗的长子和继任者。
description.en: Emperor of the Tang Dynasty, the eldest son and successor of Emperor Daizong.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝的东都，唐代宗的出生地。
description.en: The eastern capital of the Tang Dynasty and the birthplace of Emperor Daizong.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝于755年至763年发生的一场大规模叛乱，深刻影响了唐朝的国运。
description.en: A massive rebellion against the Tang Dynasty from 755 to 763, which profoundly impacted the dynasty's fate.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝，唐代宗的祖父。
description.en: Emperor of the Tang Dynasty, grandfather of Emperor Daizong.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝节度使，安史之乱的发动者。
description.en: A military governor of the Tang Dynasty who initiated the An Lushan Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗时期的宦官，曾诛杀张皇后，导致肃宗惊吓而死。
description.en: A eunuch during Emperor Daizong's reign who killed Empress Zhang, leading to Emperor Suzong's death from shock.

description.zh-cn: 唐肃宗的皇后，后被宦官李辅国所杀。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Suzong, later killed by the eunuch Li Fuguo.

description.zh-cn: 唐代中后期，地方节度使拥兵自重，形成不受中央控制的割据局面，是唐代宗时期面临的主要问题之一。
description.en: A situation in the mid to late Tang Dynasty where regional military governors (jiedushi) held autonomous power, creating a state of de facto independence from the central government. It was one of the major challenges faced during Emperor Daizong's reign.

description.zh-cn: 唐代时期的北方游牧民族政权，曾对唐朝进行勒索。
description.en: A nomadic regime to the north of the Tang Dynasty that extorted the Tang court.

description.zh-cn: 与唐朝同时期的西部强国，曾侵扰唐朝并一度占领长安。
description.en: A powerful empire to the west of the Tang Dynasty that raided Tang territory and once occupied the capital, Chang'an.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝宗室，曾被吐蕃在占领长安期间立为皇帝。
description.en: A member of the Tang imperial clan who was installed as emperor by the Tibetan Empire during their occupation of Chang'an.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝的首都。
description.en: The capital of the Tang Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 一种宗教与哲学，唐代宗笃信佛教。
description.en: A religion and philosophy devoutly followed by Emperor Daizong of Tang.

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗时期的宰相，信奉佛教。
description.en: A chancellor during the reign of Emperor Daizong, who was also a Buddhist.

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗时期的宰相，笃信佛教。
description.en: A chancellor during the reign of Emperor Daizong, who was a devout Buddhist.

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗时期的宰相，信奉佛教。
description.en: A chancellor during the reign of Emperor Daizong, who was also a Buddhist.

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗的贵妃，生韩王李迥、华阳公主，深受代宗专宠。死后追谥为贞懿皇后。
description.en: A Noble Consort of Emperor Daizong, mother of Prince Li Jiong and Princess Huayang. She was deeply favored by the emperor and was posthumously honored as Empress Zhenyi.

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗的妾室，唐德宗的生母。在安史之乱中失踪，后被遥尊为皇太后，追谥睿真皇后。
description.en: A concubine of Emperor Daizong and the mother of Emperor Dezong. She went missing during the An Lushan Rebellion and was later honored in absentia as Empress Dowager and posthumously as Empress Ruizhen.

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗为广平郡王时的元配嫡妻，生郑王李邈、召王李偲。
description.en: The primary consort of Emperor Daizong when he was the Prince of Guangping. She was the mother of Prince Li Miao and Prince Li Si.

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗之子，封韩王。
description.en: Son of Emperor Daizong, titled Prince of Han.

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗第五女，后出家为道士。
description.en: The fifth daughter of Emperor Daizong, who later became a Daoist priestess.

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗次子，封郑王，后追赠为昭靖太子。
description.en: The second son of Emperor Daizong, titled Prince of Zheng, and later posthumously honored as Crown Prince Zhaojing.

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗的贵妃，升平公主的生母。
description.en: A Noble Consort of Emperor Daizong, mother of Princess Shengping.

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗之女，下嫁郭暧。
description.en: Daughter of Emperor Daizong, married to Guo Ai.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝将领郭子仪之子，娶唐代宗女升平公主为妻。
description.en: Son of the Tang general Guo Ziyi, married Princess Shengping, daughter of Emperor Daizong.

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗之子，后被唐肃宗养为子。
description.en: Son of Emperor Daizong, who was later adopted by Emperor Suzong.

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗李豫是唐肃宗李亨的长子。
description.en: Emperor Daizong (Li Yu) was the eldest son of Emperor Suzong (Li Heng).

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗的生母是唐肃宗的妾室吴氏（章敬皇后）。
description.en: Emperor Daizong's birth mother was Emperor Suzong's concubine, Lady Wu (Empress Zhangjing).

description.zh-cn: 唐德宗李适是唐代宗的长子。
description.en: Emperor Dezong (Li Shi) was the eldest son of Emperor Daizong.

description.zh-cn: 唐德宗李适的生母是睿真皇后沈氏。
description.en: The birth mother of Emperor Dezong (Li Shi) was Empress Ruizhen (Lady Shen).

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗于开元十四年十月十三日（726年11月11日）生于东都洛阳上阳宫。
description.en: Emperor Daizong was born on November 11, 726, at Shangyang Palace in the eastern capital, Luoyang.

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗去世后，由其长子太子李适继位，是为唐德宗。
description.en: After the death of Emperor Daizong, his eldest son, Crown Prince Li Shi, succeeded to the throne as Emperor Dezong.

description.zh-cn: 安禄山发动了安史之乱。
description.en: An Lushan launched the An Lushan Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 安史之乱叛军攻占潼关，迫使唐玄宗逃离首都长安。
description.en: The An Lushan Rebellion forces captured Tongguan Pass, forcing Emperor Xuanzong to flee the capital, Chang'an.

description.zh-cn: 安史之乱结束后，大唐开始走向衰落。
description.en: After the An Lushan Rebellion ended, the Tang Dynasty began its decline.

description.zh-cn: 在安史之乱中，当时仍为广平王的李俶以兵马元帅名义收复了洛阳、长安两京。
description.en: During the An Lushan Rebellion, Li Chu, then Prince of Guangping, served as marshal and recovered the two capitals, Luoyang and Chang'an.

description.zh-cn: 宝应元年（762年），宦官李辅国杀害张皇后。
description.en: In 762, the eunuch Li Fuguo killed Empress Zhang.

description.zh-cn: 李辅国杀害张皇后，唐肃宗受惊吓而死。
description.en: Li Fuguo's murder of Empress Zhang caused Emperor Suzong to die of shock.

description.zh-cn: 李辅国杀张皇后，肃宗惊死后，李俶（后来的唐代宗）得以即位。
description.en: After Li Fuguo killed Empress Zhang and Emperor Suzong died of shock, Li Chu (the future Emperor Daizong) was able to ascend the throne.

description.zh-cn: 吐蕃侵扰唐朝，并于广德元年（763年）占领首都长安十五日。
description.en: The Tibetan Empire harassed the Tang Dynasty and occupied its capital, Chang'an, for fifteen days in 763.

description.zh-cn: 吐蕃于广德元年（763年）占领首都长安十五日。
description.en: The Tibetan Empire occupied the capital, Chang'an, for fifteen days in 763.

description.zh-cn: 吐蕃在占领长安期间，拥立李承宏为皇帝。
description.en: During their occupation of Chang'an, the Tibetan Empire installed Li Chenghong as emperor.

description.zh-cn: 在唐代宗统治时期，回鹘不断向唐朝进行勒索。
description.en: During the reign of Emperor Daizong, the Uyghur Khaganate constantly extorted the Tang court.

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗在位期间，唐朝面临着严重的藩镇割据问题。
description.en: During his reign, Emperor Daizong faced the serious problem of powerful and autonomous military governors (fanzhen).

description.zh-cn: 唐代宗笃信佛教，曾下令在五台山建造金阁寺，耗资巨大。
description.en: Emperor Daizong was a devout Buddhist and ordered the construction of the Golden Pavilion Temple on Mount Wutai at great expense.

description.zh-cn: 贞懿皇后独孤氏为唐代宗的贵妃，获得专宠。
description.en: Empress Zhenyi (Lady Dugu) was a Noble Consort of Emperor Daizong and was exclusively favored by him.

description.zh-cn: 睿真皇后沈氏在唐代宗为广平王时被赐予他为妾。
description.en: Empress Ruizhen (Lady Shen) was given to Emperor Daizong as a concubine when he was the Prince of Guangping.

description.zh-cn: 崔氏是唐代宗为广平郡王时的元配嫡妻。
description.en: Lady Cui was the primary consort of Emperor Daizong when he was the Prince of Guangping.

description.zh-cn: 崔贵妃是唐代宗的妃嫔。
description.en: Noble Consort Cui was a consort of Emperor Daizong.

description.zh-cn: 安史之乱期间，睿真皇后未能跟从出逃，落入安禄山之手，后于战乱中失踪。
description.en: During the An Lushan Rebellion, Empress Ruizhen was unable to escape, fell into the hands of An Lushan, and later disappeared amidst the chaos of war.

description.zh-cn: 李傀是唐代宗的儿子。
description.en: Li Kui was a son of Emperor Daizong.

description.zh-cn: 唐肃宗将自己的孙子、唐代宗的儿子李傀养为自己的儿子。
description.en: Emperor Suzong adopted his grandson, Li Kui (son of Emperor Daizong), as his own son.
